lightmode.timeline.notifications: Due to an unprecedented surge in traffic, your Timeline is temporarily unavailable. Your notifications history will be back online at a later time. To make sure you stay up to date on the latest news from your network, external notifications will still be sent to the email address listed under your My Account section.
lightmode.timeline.notifications.html:
Your Timeline is unavailable.

Due to an unprecedented surge in traffic, your Timeline is temporarily unavailable. Your notifications history will be back online at a later time. To make sure you stay up to date on the latest news from your network, external notifications will still be sent to the email address listed under your My Account section.

admin.timeline.intro:
This screen allows you to configure different options for each notification, by application.
  • Notification selection:
    Allows you to restrict notifications so that they won't be published on one channel alone, in other words only on the timeline or only via email.
  • Default email frequency:
    Set the default frequency for each user who has not set his or her preferences.
